document.full_text: at a clearing in an ivory coast forest, eight men sit round a pile of yellow pods several feet high, slicing them open with machetes and tipping the white resin-covered cocoa beans into plastic containers.
document.title: ivory coast cocoa crop survives crisis - for now
lines_and_colors: at a clearing in an ivory coast forest, eight men sit round a pile of yellow pods several feet high, slicing them open with machetes and tipping the white resin-covered cocoa beans into plastic containers.
